website_summaries.verdict: Understated masculine design and black-on-black color dress up this sporty model for a trendy finish. Edgy charcoal detailing contrasts the ribbed band, but durability isn't the best.
pros: Stylish jet black and charcoal color
Oversized dial increases visibility, without being heavy on the wrist
cons: Not the best visibility in low light situations

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful! I bought it a few years ago at Macy’s for my boyfriend and my dad loved it so much that I later bought one off amazon for him for Christmas. Problem is it was a knock off. Comparing it side by side with the real nighthawk (the one my boyfriend had) even the citizen box it came in looked cheap, not to mention the watch itself. Now I’m purchasing one for my brother for Christmas this year and I’m trying a different retailer that amazon offers so fingers crossed this one is actually real when it shows up in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: arianna

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, yes, it is black. It is all black. Yes, you have to study it a little more carefully to discern the time but that is to be expected with a watch that is all one color and it is not difficult. If you didn't want an all black watch, why did you buy it? This is my 5th Citizen Eco-Drive and it is as great as the rest of them. I find no issues with the finish or durability. I can only suspect that those who had problems got a fake.
customer_reviews.author: CraigC

customer_reviews.title: Solid Choice, Wish the Hands Were Luminescent
customer_reviews.text: The official website states the hands are luminous, but in reality, they are not. I love the blacked out/subdued look of the watch, and I primarily use it at work where cell phones are prohibited (San Quentin State Prison) unless authorized for duty--luckily, I don't work at night, and I'm in an office. Other than that, I have zero issues with this watch.
customer_reviews.author: HybridRoninX

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wristwatch. Have had mine for 4 years now
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wristwatch. Have had mine for 4 years now. Powder-coating is starting to wear around the strap and a couple of minor scratches on the face, but I've worn it every day for 4 years. Holds up great to office activity, yard work, and play. EcoDrive works well too. Nice to not need to change batteries. I'm a big fan of Citizen watches and this one shows promise of being around for a lifetime or more, and I hope to be able to pass it on someday.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett M

customer_reviews.title: Black is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, compliments every time I wear it. Good weight to it, not huge but large face, perfect balance of understatement and class. One caveat to an otherwise stellar review... there is not enough contrast between hands and face, near impossible to read in a dark room. But who wears a watch to keep time anymore anyway right?
customer_reviews.author: Tadow

customer_reviews.title: Great watch looks good dressed up, down, whatever.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality watch, looks great dressed up or down. The glow dials don't really last long or work but they are cool; it would be really neat to see these made from tritanium then this watch would be top notch. The pictures don't do it justice, and this is the second one I've owned, sadly the first was lost in some shady circumstances years ago so I was happy to repurchase (and keep a better eye on it).
customer_reviews.author: Jordan S

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works great. I compared it to the same watch at a jewelry store that was priced much higher and it's the same exact watch. I was worried it was a knock off or something but, as far as I can tell, it's the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Quality not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: The buttons would stick and the middle knob to move the hands was flimsy. The seconds hand did not work it wouldn’t move even charging it. Got a replacement and same thing. Went to a Macy’s to check out another Citizens watch and the button felt tough and would get stuck just like this one. For that kind of money I expected much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but too small and too much $
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch but too small for my liking. It's a little hard to read due to lack of contrast. Definitely overpriced. If it was bigger in size I would of not returned it.
customer_reviews.author: soulsacrifice

customer_reviews.title: awesome, sexy watch!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, and he loves it! The watch is large and quite hefty, so you wouldn't think it would look good on a small or thin wrist, but it's not overpowering. It's held up well this past year against scratches, and works perfectly with little interpretation needed for the chronograph. Definitely would buy another citizen's watch with Eco-Drive.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Murray

customer_reviews.title: Too Dark
customer_reviews.text: I love eco drive watches. This would have been my third if I had kept it. The problem was being able to read the time. After all, that is the primary reason for wearing one. Aside from that it's a beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is a crazy nice watch! It's not too heavy, so it doesn't weigh your wrist down, but you definitely feel it's there. The black on black looks great, and it still glows a bit in the dark after being charged in the light. The stopwatch feature is cool, but it only goes up to 60 minutes, and I'm not really sure how often I'd use it. The release button to take the watch off can get stuck sometimes, so I need to bring it to a jeweler to take a look at the spring mechanism. Otherwise, it's a great watch and would recommend it to anyone looking for an upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Good quality watch and my 4th Citizen to date. Not sure I understand the negative reviews stating a black on black watch is a little difficult to see at night (black)? I wonder if a white on white watch would be difficult to see in a blizzard (white) out scenario??
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn’t get this watch due to some reviews. Some people like fictional but I like fashionable . A good watch will always bring out the mans dress and this one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch, the only thing is....
customer_reviews.text: That you can't read the hour in the darkness, it won't shine like other Citizen watches.
customer_reviews.author: enap348

customer_reviews.title: black on black. how could you go wrong?
customer_reviews.text: great watch. love the design. love the black on black. warning: the face is black and hard to see in any low light, and forget about the dark. if you need to see this in dark places then forget it. that said, it is a really nice watch.
customer_reviews.author: korelick

customer_reviews.title: ... is not as busy as those watches and I like that. Very simple
customer_reviews.text: I have many Citizen watches and this one is not as busy as those watches and I like that. Very simple, looks great, fits well, and keeps excellent time.
customer_reviews.author: Tim McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Wow! What a stunner. Citizen delivers again!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is worth double the price. The Night Hawk blackout face is not difficult to read and the Crystal is durable. I bought this as a gift for hubby and he said it deserves SIX stars!
customer_reviews.author: tracie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WATCH ESP AT THAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I have been stalking this watch for a while, finally ordered it and have had it for about a week. This watch is heavy and well built. The price here at Amazon is about 150 dollas cheaper than the store price. THis watch is slick and accurate. The only down side is that the hands don't glow quite bright enough but it is not a deal breaker by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: The first time I wore this watch, several people commented on it. What matters even more is that I am thrilled with the watch. Looks and feels great. Very strong and durable. I own a few Citizen watches and I've found that they hold up very well and are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C

customer_reviews.title: missing booklet
customer_reviews.text: The watch didn't come with the usual Citizen booklet telling about the watch. I would really appreciate if someone would send it to me since its a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: No need for batteries
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and that it works off of natural or artificial light.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kick a$$ wathc
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch. My only gripe is there is no back light ad even with the luminous hands and marks you can barely read the watch in the dark. The watch is big enough without being to heavy and looks great. I get many compliments on it whenever I wear it. Amazon hooked it up too with a great deal for Amazon CC members.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks great and am happy with the purchase even if it is difficult to tell the time in low light. The hands and numbers glow in the dark but only for about 30 seconds after pulling the watch away from getting direct light on its face. Kind of useless to have the glowing if you ask me. Telling time during the day is no problem however. Still a great looking watch.
customer_reviews.author: rgr

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my brother. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Cace

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, dark, and breathtaking!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the price. Saved me hundreds of dollars off retail. I am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnymeister87

customer_reviews.title: ... my boyfriends first Citizen watch and he was very happy with the black stainless look
customer_reviews.text: This is my boyfriends first Citizen watch and he was very happy with the black stainless look. Definitely earned some brownie points for this. Watch comes in its original case, was packaged safely and arrived at my doorstep sooner then the expected date.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Y
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for myself, beautiful watch haven’t used as yet due to requiring a few links to be removed but can’t wait
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: My favorite watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite watch and I've received far more compliments about it than my other silver watches. Just don't plan on telling the time if you're walking in the dark without a light source around because it's all much darker than the pic shows.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Doble

customer_reviews.title: His Birthday
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this watch. It a low key watch, fit for any man.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Marcellus

customer_reviews.title: Nice to look at
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous watch, but, you really cannot see the time unless it is very dark. Nice to look at, but, functionality....not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: good watch.
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend adores this watch. His single complaint is that its impossible to tell the time in the dark or in lowly lit rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Hubby's Anniversary Gift
customer_reviews.text: He wanted this watch and Amazon had the best price. It is a very nice looking watch. I wasn't sure how I would feel about the all black feel - but I like it!
customer_reviews.author: MamaK

customer_reviews.title: Citizen CA0295-58E Eco-Drive Nighthawk
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch very manly, keeps great time would recommend to any that likes something different in a watch . Very heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: Herman Lord

customer_reviews.title: Great watch but chronograph feature not working
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch and it's sleek appearance. The chronograph feature does not work so very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: W. Chea

customer_reviews.title: I was fearful that the face is too dark but the hands and the numbers glow nicely after exposure to daylight and artificial ligh
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself. I was fearful that the face is too dark but the hands and the numbers glow nicely after exposure to daylight and artificial light. It is a really awesome looking watch and I love it. Comes with a 5 year warranty off the bat and inside the box you can register the watch and get an additional year of warranty. No complaints and big fan of Citizen watches.
customer_reviews.author: C. Scaffa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and I love the fact that I don't have to worry about changing the battery out ever!
customer_reviews.author: Hal D.

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Returned both. The dial is almost impossible to read in daylight.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful - finish wears off FAST
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I had about this watch is that not even 3 weeks of my boyfriend wearing this watch and the black finish is already coming off to expose silver underneath. I chose this watch because its really sleek and dressy looking, and I'm pleased with how it looks when we go out somewhere nice! I just wish that Citizen had chosen something a little more durable for the coating on the watch.
customer_reviews.author: MamaO-b

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this watch it definitely grabs people's attention. Very sleek very cool look. It has a more dress up feel to its look and doesn't really go with very casual attire. I question the band colors ability to hold up over time but nothing so far. The only other note is if you need reading glasses you will have a very tough time reading the face unless you have good lighting because of the black on black design but that's the appeal of the stealth look of this watch.
customer_reviews.author: CJfalco

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy Classy Yet Casual
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift it looks better than I thought. Not too big
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Rivera

customer_reviews.title: it is a nice watch. Because
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this watch is the face and dial are unreadable in anything other than bright sunlight. Indoors, I have to move to directly under a lamp to read it. Nothing on the hands or face are luminous. Black/dark gray face with black/gray hands means you need lots of light to read it. Otherwise, it is a nice watch. Because, of course, it is a Citizen Eco Drive. I have no complaints about quality, style or function. I just can't tell time on it without a flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stacy

customer_reviews.title: graet buy
customer_reviews.text: excellent watch, very professional and sporty look. you can ussed even for formal or informal occasions great buy. and will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Rolodive

customer_reviews.title: Cool watch
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch. I wore it the 1st time yesterday. Looks cool, might be difficult to read in the dark but that's what its style for. watch arms and numbers glows in the dark after the watch is exposed to light (just enough).
customer_reviews.author: Ramy R. Butros

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: Watch met all exceptions.I would recommend the this watch to anyone wanting a stylish higher end watch. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Watch!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved this watch that I bought for him, it matches his truck:) I'm curious to see how the crystal holds up to scratches and how the black wears on the band. I read a review about the crystal scratching easily so I will update this when I find out. Being that myself and my boyfriend have three citizen's eco-drive watches together, I'm wondering if we will have to switch brands eventually due to poor quality of crystal. Mine has scratched easily and his older one has also. But I do love the look of this watch and it's one he can wear every day.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Hess

customer_reviews.title: Great watch but doesn't keep charge long making it nearly impossible to see at night
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves it except it's nearly impossible to read at night and doesn't hold a charge for more then 30 seconds. Other then that it's great. It's been 2 years and it still looks new. No wear and tear yet.
customer_reviews.author: KARLA

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can not read the time at night and almost can not see the date.
customer_reviews.author: MAURICIO WURTHMANN SAAD

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't wore it as of yet as I need to have a link taken out, so unless it's a dud I can't see myself not enjoying this watch... As mentioned in all the other reviews.. It's hard to see in low light situations, however I bought it for day light use and cosmetic reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Eye Catching Time Piece
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw this watch, I knew I had to have it. I have gotten many compliments on it, and I know that Citizen's is a quality watch maker. I would recommend them to anyone looking for GREAT WATCHES!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Quality Watch at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! All black-plated stainless steal with charcoal gray numbers and dials that glow in the dark, however remain discrete in daylight. As are all Citizen's watches, this has Eco-Drive functionality and does NOT require a battery. I wear this watch to work with a button down long sleeve shirt and tie and have received many compliments! No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Tennant

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too dark overall, should be a bit clearer the pointers and numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Mesquita de Abeci

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch...sharp and classy looking however sometimes it is difficult to read the time since everything on the face is in black/dark color.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is awesome looking. If you want a blacked out watch this is the one to get. I would say this watch is more of a dress watch as apposed to a work watch. It has a decent amount of functions, but I travel across time zones often and use Z time daily. I bought it as a dress watch. As everyone has said it is hard to see the hands at night. I would purchase this watch again. If I was buying one for work I would get the Skyhawk. It has a lot more functions.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Adams

customer_reviews.title: The Chrono hand did not work at first. We ...
customer_reviews.text: The Chrono hand did not work at first. We guessed it was because the Watch was not charged. So charge it, citizen was quite helpful. Opted for the Blue angels since I could not wait for it to charge before I left for my event. Chrono hand should work after 12 - 48hr of daylight charging.
customer_reviews.author: Hei-Abe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, the date is a bit hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: Socks

customer_reviews.title: Solid Watch - Needs....
customer_reviews.text: I chose this watch because I really liked the idea of a blackout chronograph. The cool factor is very high but there are some drawbacks that warrant three stars. First, the luminescent hands and dial do not show for more than 4 hours - this is bad, especially in winter when the days are very short. Second, the Eco-Drive is great, however, I did not take into account that I wear long sleeves that cover the dial face meaning I have to be careful to leave my watch out when I get home so the watch can recharge. Finally, what this watch really needs is some sort of illumination. Other than those three issues, this is a great watch.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory D. Pickens

customer_reviews.title: very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the black on black look, I've already received compliments after only a couple of days. unless you have bad eye sight you shouldn't have problems reading the time under normal circumstances. I almost didn't buy this watch because of people's remarks regarding this issue, i'm so glad I did. if you have any questions about it, go to your local Macy's and look at it in person, then buy it on-line.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: It looks even better in person
customer_reviews.text: It looks even better in person. This was purchased as a gift for my boyfriend! He loved it and everyone compliments the watch as well!! I highly recommend this watch
customer_reviews.author: audra

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: was so excited to finally get this watch to only be disappointed. Watch is very "cheap" feeling compared to its Citizen Eco-Drive name. I have a few and this one is by far the one that falls way below par for Citizen. Not only of the way it feels, it's nearly impossible to read the time or date especially at night. With a better band, crystal and either the hands to glow or have a light.......this would be a NICE watch.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Hull

customer_reviews.title: Nice but needs lite
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very nice however it doesn't have a light so when your in a dark restaurant you can't see the time... Great for bright light not so great if it's a little dark
customer_reviews.author: Diana gromley

customer_reviews.title: Watch is in great shape (5star) but didn't come with any links and ...
customer_reviews.text: Watch is in great shape (5star) but didn't come with any links and is too small...had to request extra links from Citizen which takes 10days to ship. Overall solid watch for the deal.
customer_reviews.author: nikk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This watch was a gift for my boyfriend he says "this watch is the tits"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, very comfortable. Love the eco-drive technology. It is a dark watch with dark dials and is difficult to see at night, but that is the look I was going for so I'm very satisfied. I get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: PMAK

customer_reviews.title: Love it but....
customer_reviews.text: Its an awesome watch, it only has chronograph and tachymeter but i dont real y need anything else. The only issue is that its almost impossible to look at the hands at night. The numbers and hands charge during sunlight but it doesnt lástima for more that 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Gags

customer_reviews.title: Nice but you can easily scratch it and underneath is ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice but you can easily scratch it and underneath is a silver color. All in all it's a beautiful watch
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie C

customer_reviews.title: awesome watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Never need a battery change. Wear it daily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful time piece. It was way more elegant than I pictured and hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Ryno

customer_reviews.title: nicewatch but it doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: nice watch but it doesn't work; internal solar battery doesn't charge :s
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: We ended up returning because the numbers were very hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: vsmith0513

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Watch, Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this watch `dresses` very well. It looks amazing on your wrist. The only problem is in the total absence of light, where you won`t be able to tell the time. But even in low light situations(like inside a movie theater) I'm able to tell the time because the clock hands reflect the light. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: dgr

customer_reviews.title: It was a Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiance for his Birthday and he loves it! So far,so good. It looks just like the pic.
customer_reviews.author: TRACY

customer_reviews.title: Citizen Men`s Nighthawk Watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my son & he thinks it`s awesome & just loves it! I would recommend this watch for any young adult.
customer_reviews.author: Cher66

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch!
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable brand! I've watches from Citizen since I was very young... Never gave me any problem. About this watch... - good size - not heavy - Eco-Drive techonology - good looking
customer_reviews.author: augusto

customer_reviews.title: Was the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: Very handsome piece! Was the perfect gift....so many compliments already!!!!
customer_reviews.author: rachel panek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works very good as all Citizen's i've had
customer_reviews.author: Luis Gonza

customer_reviews.title: Thewatch is EXTREMELY dark
customer_reviews.text: The watch is EXTREMELY dark. This normally wouldn't be a problem if the glow in the dark paint they use was better. Whatever substance they use for glow in the dark is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: viasacra89

customer_reviews.title: Great watch just too hard to read the watch hands in anything but bright light.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch just too hard to read the watch hands in anything but bright light.
customer_reviews.author: R Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch If You Don't Need to Know the Time
customer_reviews.text: It's a great match for my black iPhone. Almost impossible to see the hands and tell the time! It is comfortable and well-made. The band is large and fit my wrist perfectly. It has a slight military style which enhances its appeal. I've had very good luck with Citizen products; this is the third Citizen that I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Oradellian

customer_reviews.title: Sexy watch
customer_reviews.text: First of all the pictures of the watch do it no justice than seeing it in person on your wrist. It's black on black on black and in the dark the numbers and hands glow green. And if you're the person who likes fancy things but doesn't want it to stand out this watch is likely for you.
customer_reviews.author: chrisd

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i got this for my boyfriend and the pictures do not do this watch justice. well worth every penny !
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiance as a present. It is a good looking watch, as he just moved to night i though this would be clever to get it to him. Only thing I was misconceived about was the second hand doen't tick, it is a stopwatch. Other than that, A++ product
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Versatile watch
customer_reviews.text: Husband was very happy with this watch. I like that it is not glossy and flashy. Works well as a casual everyday watch, or he can wear to out for date night.
customer_reviews.author: kristin anne

customer_reviews.title: Timepiece
customer_reviews.text: Good timepiece a little disappointed about not being able to read the watch clearly. All and all decent purchase. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jason H. Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch, if you can see the hands.
customer_reviews.text: A very stylish watch. My only quibble has to do with the low contrast between the watch hands and face. If there is any reflection at all on the crystal it is just about impossible to read the time! We'll see how this works out over the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: S David Blakeley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. My second Eco drive. The black on black look can be a tough read at certain times of the day but not a huge deal. The style and features are nothing less than top quality. This watch is noticeably heavier than my other Eco drive but not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: The watch is beatiful but I'm part dissaponted with "glow" ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beatiful but I'm part dissaponted with "glow" feature of it. It is very hard to find numbers when checking the time with low level of light in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Octavio Covarrubias

customer_reviews.title: Too dark to read the face
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and I am now returning it. It is so difficult to read the face in the day time. At night the face glows but during the day its almost impossible to read.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks so great on his wrist
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES this watch. It looks so great on his wrist. He did have to take it to get 2 links removed but that is normal. Great quality and definitely a great looking watch.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie416

customer_reviews.title: Too Dark!
customer_reviews.text: The face shows the numbers and dials to be lighter than the background, but upon receipt that isn't the case.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Weber

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome
customer_reviews.text: First I wanna say is this watch is really cool! But I found some problems, the surface of the glass seems can be abraded easily. and this watch isn't bright in the dark. I am planning to change a better glass....
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! Great looking also! I get compliments almost everytime I where it. Its sophisticated and sleak! Only bad thing - it pulls my arm hair, but I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: man what a watch the bes of the best. thank you you very much
customer_reviews.text: man what a watch the bes of the best. thank you you very much.& it keeps perfect timethanks againn. yours truly hawk woods.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stealthy , Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is nicely designed. Looks great for casual or business attire. My only complaints are 1. The numbers and hands are a little dark to see against the black face, especially at night. 2. The hands and hourly markers do not glow well, if at all. 3. The watch could be a little larger diameter.But overall a really nice looking watch.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these as gifts. Battery on one was low but as soon as I recharged them they ran perfect. Watch looks even better when you actually see it than it does on line. At this price you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do not see any of the Negative reviews out there coming to life with mywatch..
customer_reviews.text: I had my for about a year now.. I do not see any of the Negative reviews out there coming to life with my watch... AWESOME Watch..
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: it seems to be a really nice watch!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch for my husband, he loves the look of it although he has not worn it yet. it seems to be a really nice watch!
customer_reviews.author: shirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful watch, I really like it! The eco system is fantastic the watch works very well. Its watch for whole life Thks
customer_reviews.author: Luiz Dinardi

customer_reviews.title: This watch will be noticed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch because it just captures your attention. I tried to adjust to the dark face but it is just too dark for me. In the very short time I wore it before I sent it back I couldn't believe the amount of comments I received. That just proves that it will be noticed.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Stealty, but maybe to dark dial
customer_reviews.text: Stealthy look, almost too dark. Would have been nice if it had a button for illuminating the dial in dark conditions. Looks expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Kolstad

product_meta.title: Citizen Watches CA0295-58E Eco-Drive Nighthawk Watch
product_meta.description:
* Watch Sizing Guide
 * Citizen Eco-Drive™ FAQ
 * Fly under the radar with the stylish stealth of this Citizen® timepiece.
 * Eco-Drive never needs a battery.
 * Ion-plated stainless steel case and bracelet.
 * Fold-over clasp closure with push-button release and safety bar.
 * Three-hand analog display with quartz movement, three sub-dials and date display window.
 * Chronograph functionality.
 * Black dial includes hour markers and tachymeter at perimeter.
 * Water resistant 20 ATM/200 meters.
 * Citizen Watch offers a five-year limited manufacturer's warranty on all their products. For more information, please visit their website and see the "Service Information" section.
 * Measurements: *  Case Height: 43 mm
    *  Case Width: 43 mm
    *  Case Depth: 13 mm
    *  Band Width: 19 0⁄1 mm
    *  Band Circumference/Length: 10 in
    *  Weight: 6 oz

feature_bullets: Black ion-plated watch featuring black-and-charcoal dial with date window, tachymeter outer dial, and three chronograph function subdials
Eco-Drive technology is fueled by light and never needs a battery
43 mm stainless steel case with mineral dial window
Japanese quartz movement with analog display
Stainless steel bracelet featuring fold-over clasp with double push-button and safety
Water resistant to 200 m (660 ft): In general, suitable for professional marine activity and serious surface water sports, but not scuba diving
